text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump This is the same bullshit @realDonaldTrump was peddling during his Coronavirus press briefings. I thought this was supposed to be a cabinet meeting. Not a meeting to air his grievances and try to praise himself https://t.co/ipae4Pt7dj
